original_body_lines: One tablespoon pineapple – blended – and one tablespoon raw honey
1. Mix the two ingredients together and apply with a fan brush liberally to your face and neck.
Note that this mask comes off really easily so don’t scrub too much. Also your skin may also be sensitive afterwards so it’s better that you use a warm washcloth to gently wipe your face.
1. Mix all ingredients together in a bowl and apply it on your skin and leave if for 10-15 minutes.

Rubbing a slice of pineapple on dry or rough skin, like knees, elbows and heels, will help soften the tougher areas of skin. Try dipping it into raw sugar for extra exfoliation! (But don’t overdo it or your skin will become too tender.)
|Half can pineapple chunks, four tablespoons good coconut oil, half tablespoon coconut flakes |
1. Blend the pineapple into a fine pulp with the coconut oil.
1/4 cup chopped fresh pineapple and one tablespoon coconut milk |
1. Place ingredients in a blender, or food processor, and blend until smooth.
3. Leave on for five or 10 minutes and then rinse well with warm water.
